page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: ON SATURDAY I GET OUT OF BED AND MAKE MY BREAKFAST. I HAVE CORNFLAKES AND A SLICE OF TOAST, AFTER THAT I GO OUTSIDE AND CALL FOR DAVID. WE GO FOR A CYCLE RIDE TOGETHER. AT 11.20AM. I COME HOME TO WATCH "CHIPS" ON TELEVISION UNTIL 12.15PM. I HAVE A LITTLE PLAY, THEN I HAVE DINNER BEFORE GOING TO GRANS WHICH IS A SHORT JOURNEY OF 7 MILES. WE RETURN HOME BETWEEN 4PM. AND 5PM. AND HAVE OUR TEA. AFTER TEA I PLAY WITH DAVID AGAIN UNTIL 8.30PM. WHEN I COME IN AND WATCH TELEVISION UNTIL 9.30PM. AND THEN I GO TO BED.
